text: @BetsyDeVosED @TuckerCarlson My sons will not return to FCPS this fall. These people are crazy!!!! I wish they would, they need to go to school but need to be healthy and not sick in order to go. Runny nose and fever they need to stay home, COVID-19 w/no vaccine send them on back??? This sounds horrific!!!!
